General.Name: PADAUK Technology Co. Ltd
General.Description: PADAUK Technology Company Limited develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers. Its products are used in interactive smart toys, remote control appliances, smart household appliances, industrial grade chips, and high-efficiency brushless DC motors. PADAUK Technology Company Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Gongdao 5th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30069
